title: samayamidEra nannu
sahitya:
samayamidEra nannu brOva sAkEtAdhipa shrI rAma


anupallavi

  kamala nayana sItA manOhara kAmajanaka mangaLAkAra


caraNam 1    bhUmipAla karuNAlavAla budha janAvana lOla sushIla 
nI mahimalu telisi telisi cAla ninnu vEDiti nIvE gati
    caraNam 2    dAnavAntaka prahlAdAdi bhakta pAlaka paramOddAyaka 
pUni ninnu nAdu madini drDhamuga namminAnu dikku nIvEnu
    caraNam 3    nI samAna daivamu lEdani sakala shrutulu moraliDavini sharaNaNTi 
dAsa pOSaka sadAshivArti bhanjana dAna bhUSaNAmita guNa
